name: Honey Harvest (ReidHarry, Ikercorian, GabyBendtsen, Vendolak, whitedr1, godtierladybug)
name_original: Honey Harvest (ReidHarry, Ikercorian, GabyBendtsen, Vendolak, whitedr1, godtierladybug)
description:
Honey Harvest is an arcade crafting game where you play as a busy bee collecting pollen in order to craft unique honey for the Queen!

Created for a 48hr Game Jam! Theme: "Honey Bee"

Programming: Reid Harry, Drew White

2D Art: Zoe Naylor, Kalea Vendola

3D Art: Gaby Bendtsen, Ian Kercorian, Rachel Flatley

How To Play:

  1. Obtain a Honey Recipe at the hive.
  2. Buzz around to the flowers to collect the different colored pollen.
  3. Once your recipe checklist hits 0, turn in your pollen at the hive before time runs out!

Controls:

  • Space: Fly
  • WASD or Arrow Keys: Flight Controls
